summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Alton Ave. Northeast from Northeast 105th Street to 40th Ave. Northeast; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 17414 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installation notes.
